title: The most Christian Kings edict or proclamation, concerning English, Scotish, and Irish ships that shall be met at sea by His said Majesties ships, or by privateers acting by his commission, / translated out of the French, and published by authority.
author: France. Sovereign (1643-1715 : Louis XIV)
publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,
